caption.center: ALEDWARD ROBERTSON, Appellant, v. STATE OF FL, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla.R.App.P. 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Pasco County; Pat Siracusa, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED. See Pratte v. State, 946 So. 2d 1184 (Fla. 2d DCA 2006); Bizzell v. State, 912 So. 2d 386 (Fla. 2d DCA 2005); Carpenter v. State,884 So. 2d 385 (Fla. 2d DCA 2004); Collins v. State, 800 So. 2d 660 (Fla. 2d DCA 2001); Williams v. State, 907 So. 2d 1224 (Fla. 5th DCA 2005); Lopez v. State, 833 So. 2d 283 (Fla. 5th DCA 2002); Martin v. State, 795 So. 2d 143 (Fla. 3d DCA 2001).
CASANUEVA, C.J., and ALTENBERND and KELLY, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINEDPage 573
